u_d.description: URL metrics on a domain level

u_s.description: URL metrics on a subdomain level

u_p.description: URL metrics on a page level

a_ptd.description: Anchor text report, phrase to domain

a_pts.description: Anchor text report, phrase to subdomain

a_ptp.description: Anchor text report, phrase to page

a_ttd.description: Anchor text report, term to domain

a_tts.description: Anchor text report, term to subdomain

a_ttp.description: Anchor text report, term to page

l_dtd.description: Incoming links to specified domain, one per linking domain

l_dts.description: Incoming links to specified subdomain, one per linking domain

l_dtp.description: Incoming links to specified page, one per linking domain

l_ptd.description: Incoming links from pages to specified domain

l_pts.description: Incoming links from pages to specified subdomain

l_ptp.description: Incoming links from pages to specified page
